org.smartfrog.services.xunit.log
Interface TestListenerLog

All Superinterfaces:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.logging.LogRemote, java.rmi.Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
TestListenerLogImpl
public interface TestListenerLog
extends org.smartfrog.sfcore.logging.LogRemote

Remote interface to something that listens for smartfrog events and yet which can be pointed at a listener or two. created 18-May-2006 15:32:57
